Task-oriented Sunglasses: These sunglasses are designed to help you focus on your tasks without distraction. They come with a built-in productivity app that provides you with productivity tips and reminders to help you stay on track.

Task-Finishing Aura: These sunglasses are designed to emit a calming aura that helps you finish your tasks with ease. The aura is infused with a blend of calming essential oils, such as lavender and chamomile, that promote relaxation and focus.

Task-Finishing Power-Ups: These sunglasses come with a range of power-ups that help you complete tasks faster and more efficiently. From a boost of caffeine to a quick burst of productivity music, these power-ups are designed to help you stay energized and motivated.

Task-Finishing Augmented Reality: These sunglasses come with an augmented reality feature that helps you visualize your tasks and goals. The AR feature provides a virtual representation of your tasks, allowing you to see how much progress you've made and what remains to be done.
Task-Finishing Soundtrack: These sunglasses come with a built-in soundtrack that helps you stay motivated and focused
